Topic.Title: Will eventually be a problem for KO

Message.Msg: has anybody every looked at Sodastream from a infectious control aspect. I for one find it hard to visulize the avarage person sterilizing there plastic bottles for reuse. To simple rinse out for multiple uses leaves me kinda cold. I'm sure Sodastream probably addresses that in there instruction sheet, however, people tend to bypass that aspect over time.
you will be sent tax forms from your broker, the dividends are declared as income on your tax return in April

Message.Title: Is KO buying BBDA? BBDA is up over 500%
Message.Msg: Is KO buying BBDA? BBDA is up over 500% in the last 30 days. Its Koma Unwind beverage brand hits Walmart stores this month. BBDA may be an acquisition target now that it's brand has made it to the biggest retailer in the world.
